PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Gel permeation chromatography ( GPC ) analysis showed that PBDT-TDPP-S has a numberaverage molecular weight ( M n ) of 1.34 × 10^4 g mol^-1 with a polydispersity index of 1.27 ( Figure S1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. Number-average molecular weight (Mn): This is a property value representing the average molecular weight of the polymer, taking into account the number of each molecular weight present in the sample and their respective quantities.
2. Polydispersity index (PDI): This is a property value that describes the degree of polydispersity or heterogeneity in the molecular weight distribution of a polymer. In this case, the value is 1.27.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Number-average molecular weight (Mn): 1.34 × 10^4 g mol^-1
2. Polydispersity index (PDI): 1.27

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Number-average molecular weight (Mn): 1.34 × 10^4 g mol^-1 |
| Polydispersity index (PDI): 1.27 |
